armors.name: Advanced Filtration
armors.description: Provides 80% resistance to gas damage and effects.

armors.name: Democracy Protects
armors.description: 50% chance to not die when taking lethal damage. Prevents all damage from bleeding if chest hemorrhages.

armors.name: Engineering Kit
armors.description: Further reduces recoil when crouching or prone by 30%. Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of grenades by +2.

armors.name: Fortified
armors.description: Further reduces recoil when crouching or prone by 30%. Provides 50% resistance to explosive damage.

armors.name: Inflammable
armors.description: Provides 75% resistance to fire, allowing bearer to rest assured in their inflammability.

armors.name: Med-Kit
armors.description: Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of stims by +2. Increases stim effect duration by 2.0s.

armors.name: Peak Physique
armors.description: Increases melee damage by 100%. Improves weapons handling with less drag on weapon movement.

armors.name: Scout
armors.description: Markers placed on the map will generate radar scans every 2.0s. Reduces range at which enemies can detect the wearer by 30%.

armors.name: Servo-Assisted
armors.description: Increases throwing range by 30%. Provides +50% limb health.

armors.name: Unflinching
armors.description: Helps Prevent Helldivers from flinching when hit.

armors.name: Siege-Ready
armors.description: Increases reload speed of primary weapons by 30%. Increases ammo capacity of primary weapons by 20%.

armors.name: Acclimated
armors.description: Grants a 50% resistance to fire, gas, acid and arc damage.

armors.name: Gunslinger
armors.description: Increases sidearms reload speed by 40%. Sidearm draw/holster speed increased by 50%. Sidearm recoil reduced by 70%.

armors.name: Reinforced Epaulettes
armors.description: Increases reload speed of primary weapons by 30%. Gives wearer a 50% chance to avoid grievous limb injury. Increases melee damage by 50%.

armors.name: Ballistic Padding
armors.description: Provides 25% resistance to chest damage. Provides 25% resistance to explosive damage. Prevents all damage from bleeding if chest hemorrhages.
